experience.title: Klaxit
experience.description: Backend development for the Klaxit application (new feature implementation and bug fixes). Additionally, I developed a machine learning model to detect fraudulent activity (data collection, training, automation, and deployment).

experience.title: Fitthree Pte Ltd
experience.description: Design a system that establish optimized delivery routes for the company's drivers based on a list of orders and a set of constraints. The generated routes will be fed to the tracking management system.

experience.title: C.E.A. Paris-Saclay
experience.description: A two months internship at the C.E.A. Paris-Saclay, my assignment was to program a computer simulation predicting the behavior of neutrons in the core of a nuclear reactor.

experience.title: C.E.E.S.A.R.
experience.description: A one month worker internship where I created a database of autopsy reports and modified high speed crash test footage.

experience.title: DIMENSION
experience.description: I create videos for a popular science program on the Internet called DIMENSION. It's a 5 minutes animated video format where I talk about many topics such as astrophysics, mathematics or computer science.
